about_the_game:
GAME OVERVIEW

Embrace the dual nature of survival in "After the Turn": Prey by day, predator by night.

Introducing "After the Turn," a gripping First Person Survival Horror experience from Groom Lake Studios, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Immerse yourself in a haunting world where music composed by Iestyn Haberfield sets the tone for your journey.

Unravel the mysteries of a post-apocalyptic world through a compelling story mode that delves into the events that led to its downfall. Explore handcrafted maps teeming with detail and passion, each with its own unique story waiting to be discovered.

In an alternate universe where vampires and zombies roam, survival means more than just avoiding the undead. Harvest vampire blood to create a cure against zombie bites, while fending off attacks from both creatures day and night.

But dangers lurk beyond the undead – rebel factions, rival groups, and wildlife all pose threats to your survival. Will you navigate this treacherous world and emerge victorious?

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS:
• Explore: Roam large open worlds filled with diverse locations and stories to uncover, whether in single player or multiplayer. Every house, building, tree, and rock is ripe for exploration and harvesting.

• Craft: Forge multiple items and tools to aid in your survival, from weapons and armor to essential supplies.

• Farming: Cultivate crops in dedicated plots, managing water and weather conditions to ensure their growth and sustenance.

• Temperature: When the temperature drops due to rain or snow, you'll need to seek shelter to avoid the cold.

• Building: Construct your own base or shelter when venturing far from safety, customizing your sanctuary to your liking.

• Weapons and Armor: Arm yourself with a variety of firearms, melee weapons, and protective gear to fend off threats.

• NPCs: Interact with a living, breathing world populated by quest givers, merchants, and individuals with tales to share.

• Hunting: Hunt wild animals for sustenance and crafting materials, expanding your survival options.

• Vehicles: Utilize functional vehicles with storage capabilities to expedite scavenging runs, ensuring you stay one step ahead of danger.

• Lockpicking: Gain access to locked areas by mastering the art of lockpicking, a skill useful in both single player and multiplayer modes.

• Flashlight: Conserve battery power as you navigate the darkness, scavenging for spare batteries to keep your light burning.

• Food and Drink: Scour the open world for sustenance, crafting meals and medicines to fortify yourself against the challenges ahead.

• Day/Night and Weather: Experience the dynamic passage of time and unpredictable weather patterns that shape your journey.

• Additional Mechanics: Engage in swimming, climbing, and other activities, while honing your skills to adapt to this unforgiving landscape.

Stay tuned for future updates introducing new features such as player electricity systems, expanded vehicle options, trauma system, and formidable adversaries. Will you conquer the darkness and emerge as the ultimate survivor in "After the Turn"?
